
                            
                            <p>限湖南掌银用户参加。不是的领不了。 <br>  <br> 1.顶置的学霸奖学金横幅必得3元 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/05/014001ffzmj1h1jcwjhjbr.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/05/014001ffzmj1h1jcwjhjbr.png"> <br>  <br> 2.给自己其他卡转5元或者5元以上必得3元。 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/05/014001hdlol22fdl1jdsbe.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/05/014001hdlol22fdl1jdsbe.png"> <br>  <br> 3.点亮必得1.8元 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/05/014001p73ikeqk8wfi7s3e.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/05/014001p73ikeqk8wfi7s3e.png"> <br> </p>
